content.html:
Specifications

System
Flash mode● MODE: TTL MODE (FLASH AUTO, STANDARD, SLOW SYNC.), MANUAL, COMMANDER, OFF ● SYNC. MODE: 1ST CURTAIN, 2ND CURTAIN ● RED EYE REMOVAL: ◎돈은 FLASH+REMOVAL, ◎↕ FLASH, 09 REMOVAL, OFF
Hot shoeAccessory shoe with TTL contacts
Optical viewfinder (OVF)Reverse Galilean viewfinder with electronic bright frame dis- play and approx. 0.52x magnification; frame coverage approx. 95%
Electronic viewfinder (EVF)0.5-in., 3690k-dot OLED viewfinder; magnification 0.66x with 50 mm lens (35 mm format equivalent) at infinity and diopter set to -1.0 m-1; diagonal angle of view approximately 32° (horizontal angle of view approximately 27°) ● Diopter adjustment: -4 to +2 m-1 ● Eyepoint: Approximately 16.8 mm
LCD monitor3.0-in/7.6 cm, 1620k-dot color touchscreen LCD monitor, tilting
Movies (with stereo sound)● Movie size: 4K 16:9, DCE 17:9, FHD 16:9, FHD 17:9 ● Frame rate: 59.94P, 50P, 29.97P, 25P, 24P, 23.98P ● Bit rate: 200Mbps, 100Mbps, 50Mbps ● Recording/output format: SD card, 4:2:0, 8-bit/HDMI output, 4:2:2, 10-bit
High-speed movies● Movie size: FULL HD 16:9 ● Frame advance rate: 120P, 100P

Input/output terminals


Microphone connector⌀2.5 mm mini-stereo jack
Headphone jack socketThe USB connector can be converted to a headphone jack socket using a USB Type-C to ⌀3.5 mm stereo mini-pin jack adapter cable compatible with analog audio I/O (USB Type-C Audio Adapter Accessory Mode)
Remote release connector⌀2.5 mm 3-pole mini jack
Digital input/outputUSB connector (Type-C) USB3.1Gen1
HDMI outputHDMI Micro connector (type D)

Technical
Notes
12
321

# Specifications

| System |  |
| --- | --- |
| Flash mode | ● MODE: TTL MODE (FLASH AUTO, STANDARD, SLOW SYNC.), MANUAL, COMMANDER, OFF ● SYNC. MODE: 1ST CURTAIN, 2ND CURTAIN ● RED EYE REMOVAL: ◎돈은 FLASH+REMOVAL, ◎↕ FLASH, 09 REMOVAL, OFF |

| Electronic viewfinder (EVF) | 0.5-in., 3690k-dot OLED viewfinder; magnification 0.66x with 50 mm lens (35 mm format equivalent) at infinity and diopter set to -1.0 m-1; diagonal angle of view approximately 32° (horizontal angle of view approximately 27°) ● Diopter adjustment: -4 to +2 m-1 ● Eyepoint: Approximately 16.8 mm |
| LCD monitor | 3.0-in/7.6 cm, 1620k-dot color touchscreen LCD monitor, tilting |
| Movies (with stereo sound) | ● Movie size: 4K 16:9, DCE 17:9, FHD 16:9, FHD 17:9 ● Frame rate: 59.94P, 50P, 29.97P, 25P, 24P, 23.98P ● Bit rate: 200Mbps, 100Mbps, 50Mbps ● Recording/output format: SD card, 4:2:0, 8-bit/HDMI output, 4:2:2, 10-bit |
| High-speed movies | ● Movie size: FULL HD 16:9 ● Frame advance rate: 120P, 100P |


Input/output terminals

| Microphone connector | ⌀2.5 mm mini-stereo jack |
| --- | --- |
| Headphone jack socket | The USB connector can be converted to a headphone jack socket using a USB Type-C to ⌀3.5 mm stereo mini-pin jack adapter cable compatible with analog audio I/O (USB Type-C Audio Adapter Accessory Mode) |
| Remote release connector | ⌀2.5 mm 3-pole mini jack |
| Digital input/output | USB connector (Type-C) USB3.1Gen1 |
| HDMI output | HDMI Micro connector (type D) |
